hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc
sudo yum install -y tar wget wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/java/8.0.5.7/linux/s390x/ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.7.bin wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zos-spark/scala-workbench/master/files/installer.properties.java tail -n +3 installer.properties.java | tee installer.properties cat installer.properties chmod +x ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.7.bin sudo ./ibm-java-s390x-sdk-8.0-5.7.bin -r installer.properties export JAVA_HOME=/opt/ibm/java export PATH=$JAVA_HOME/bin:$PATH java -version export WORK_DIR=`pwd`
###Install GCC 4.8.2 sudo yum install -y wget tar make gcc gcc-c++ binutils-devel bzip2 cd $WORK_DIR wget http://ftp.gnu.org/gnu/gcc/gcc-4.8.2/gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 bunzip2 gcc-4.8.2.tar.bz2 tar xvf gcc-4.8.2.tar cd gcc-4.8.2/ ./contrib/download_prerequisites cd $WORK_DIR mkdir gccbuild cd gccbuild/ ../gcc-4.8.2/configure --prefix=$HOME/install/gcc-4.8.2 --enable-shared --disable-multilib --enable-threads=posix --with-system-zlib --enable-languages=c,c++ make sudo make install export PATH=$HOME/install/gcc-4.8.2/bin:$PATH export LD_LIBRARY_PATH=$HOME/install/gcc-4.8.2/lib64:$LD_LIBRARY_PATH gcc --version
#Install Nodejs cd $WORK_DIR wget http://public.dhe.ibm.com/ibmdl/export/pub/systems/cloud/runtimes/nodejs/6.12.2.0/linux/s390x/ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin chmod +x ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin echo -e "LICENSE_ACCEPTED=TRUE\nUSER_INSTALL_DIR=$WORK_DIR/ibm/node\n-fileOverwrite_$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/_node_installation/uninstall.lax=Yes" > installer.properties cat installer.properties ./ibm-6.12.2.0-node-v6.12.2-linux-s390x.bin -f installer.properties -i silent export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/sbin:$WORK_DIR/ibm/node/bin node -v
#Install PM2 npm install pm2@2.10.1 -g
#Verification
echo "var http = require('http'); var server = http.createServer(function (request, response) { response.writeHead(200, {\"Content-Type\": \"text/plain\"}); response.end(\"Welcome to pm2\n\"); }); server.listen(8080); console.log(\"Server running at http://127.0.0.1:8080/\");" > app.js
#Run the application pm2 start app.js sleep 30s curl http://127.0.0.1:8080/
#pm2 monit
pm2 stop all sleep 30s pm2 kill sleep 20s
